Name: blocker_status_open
Description: Blockers must be open to resolve.

Name: user_story_status_done
Description: User stories must be in 'Done' state.

Name: sprint_status_active
Description: Sprints must be in the 'Active' state.

Name: velocity_positive_trend
Description: Velocity must have a positive trend

Name: epic_status_active
Description: Epics must be in active state

Name: release_plan_status_planned
Description: Release plan must be in planned state

Name: project_status_in_progress
Description: Project status should be in progress.

Name: sprint_goal_achievement_complete
Description: Sprint Goal Achievement should be complete.
